mapper.update:
update employee_
bank_account = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal_name = #{salName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
post_category = #{postCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal_id = #{salId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sal_dep = #{salDep,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal_post = #{salPost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal_date = #{salDate,jdbcType=DATE},
sal_oa = #{salOa,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sta_category = #{staCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal_remark = #{salRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal_basic = #{salBasic,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_dues = #{salDues,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_manhour = #{salManhour,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_postsal = #{salPostsal,jdbcType=REAL},
end_insurance = #{endInsurance,jdbcType=REAL},
labour_cost = #{labourCost,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_coef = #{salCoef,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_benefitwage = #{salBenefitwage,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_bonus = #{salBonus,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_manhour_bonus = #{salManhourBonus,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_manhour_salary = #{salManhourSalary,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_overtime = #{salOvertime,jdbcType=REAL},

sal_check = #{salCheck,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_holiday = #{salHoliday,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_absence = #{salAbsence,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_other = #{salOther,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_should = #{salShould,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_heath_insurance = #{salHeathInsurance,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_unemp = #{salUnemp,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_ill = #{salIll,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_consume = #{salConsume,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_penalty = #{salPenalty,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_withhold = #{salWithhold,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_waste = #{salWaste,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_waterandele = #{salWaterandele,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_acc_fund = #{salAccFund,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_last_withhold = #{salLastWithhold,jdbcType=REAL},

sal_secrecy = #{salSecrecy,jdbcType=REAL},
sal_skilllevel = #{salSkilllevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sal_skillsalary = #{salSkillsalary,jdbcType=REAL},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from employee_
and sal_id like concat("%",#{sal_id},"%")
and sal_name like "%"#{sal_name}"%"
and sal_oa like "%"#{sal_oa}"%"
